<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_fsm_mobile.FSMMobileUsageConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Contants for mobile usage including collection category, collection points,  collectoin events and bucket names</description>
        <name>FSMMobileUsageConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMMobileUsageConstants = Class.create();
FSMMobileUsageConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'FSMMobileUsageConstants'
};
FSMMobileUsageConstants.CATEGORY = "field_service_mobile";

//metadata offline
FSMMobileUsageConstants.COLLECTION_POINT_OFFLINE = "sn_fsm_mobile_offline";

FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_WOT_OFFLINE = "create.wot.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_WOT_OFFLINE = "edit.wot.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_INCIDENTAL_OFFLINE = "create.incidental.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_INCIDENTAL_OFFLINE = "edit.incidental.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_OFFLINE = "create.partreq.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_WORK_ORDER_OFFLINE = "create.wo.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_TIME_WORKED_OFFLINE = "create.timeworked.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_TIME_WORKED_OFFLINE = "edit.timeworked.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_START_WORK_OFFLINE = "start.work.offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CLOSE_COMPLETE_OFFLINE = "close.wot.complete.offline";


FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_OFFLINE_FROM_WO = "Create work order task for work order offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_OFFLINE_FROM_ASSET_FROM_WO = "Create work order task when create work order from an asset offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_OFFLINE_FOR_SIBLING_TASK = "Create new sibling work order task offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_WOT_OFFLINE = "Edit work order task offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_INCIDENTAL_OFFLINE = "Create incidental offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_INCIDENTAL_OFFLINE = "Edit incidental offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_OFFLINE_FROM_INVENTORY = "Create part requirement offline from inventory";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_OFFLINE_FROM_WOT = "Create part requirement offline from work order task";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WORK_ORDER_OFFLINE = "Create work order from an asset offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_TIME_WORKED_OFFLINE = "Create time worked offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_TIME_WORKED_OFFLINE = "Edit time worked offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_START_WORK_OFFLINE = "Start work offline";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CLOSE_COMPLETE_OFFLINE = "Close complete offline";

//metadata online
FSMMobileUsageConstants.COLLECTION_POINT_ONLINE = "sn_fsm_mobile_online";

FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE = "create.wot.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_WOT_ONLINE = "edit.wot.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_INCIDENTAL_ONLINE = "create.incidental.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_INCIDENTAL_ONLINE = "edit.incidental.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_ONLINE = "create.partreq.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_WORK_ORDER_ONLINE = "create.wo.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_TIME_WORKED_ONLINE = "create.timeworked.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_EDIT_TIME_WORKED_ONLINE = "edit.timeworked.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CREATE_EVENT_ONLINE = "create.event.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_START_WORK_ONLINE = "start.work.online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.EVENT_CLOSE_COMPLETE_ONLINE = "close.wot.complete.online";

FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE_FROM_WO = "Create work order task for work order online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE_FROM_ASSET_FROM_WO = "Create work order task when create work order from an asset online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE_FOR_SIBLING_TASK = "Create new sibling work order task online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE_FOLLOWUP_TAST_CLOSED_COMPLETE = "Create followup task for a closed complete task online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WOT_ONLINE_FOLLOWUP_TAST_CLOSED_INCOMPLETE = "Create followup task for a closed incomplete task online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_WOT_ONLINE = "Edit work order task online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_INCIDENTAL_ONLINE = "Create incidental online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_INCIDENTAL_ONLINE = "Edit incidental online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_ONLINE_FROM_INVENTORY = "Create part requirement online from inventory";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_PART_REQUIREMENT_ONLINE_FROM_WOT = "Create part requirement online from work order task";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_WORK_ORDER_ONLINE = "Create work order from an asset online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_TIME_WORKED_ONLINE = "Create time worked online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_EDIT_TIME_WORKED_ONLINE = "Edit time worked online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CREATE_EVENT_ONLINE = "Create event online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_START_WORK_ONLINE = "Start work online";
FSMMobileUsageConstants.FLOW_CLOSE_COMPLETE_ONLINE = "Close complete online";

//buckets
FSMMobileUsageConstants.BUCKET_FLOW_NAME = "flow_name";
]]></script>
